verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> and <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> <S%H1419>Great<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of his <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>

Beautiful <S%H3303><s%> for <S%H5131>situation,<s%> the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> is <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> on the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4428>King.<s%>
God <S%H430><s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> in her <S%H759>palaces<s%> for a <S%H4869>refuge.<s%>
They <S%H1992><s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, and <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H8539>marveled;<s%> they were <S%H926>troubled,<s%> and hasted <S%H2648>away.<s%>
Fear <S%H7461><s%> took hold <S%H270>upon<s%> them <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H2427>pain,<s%> as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail.<s%>

As <S%H834><s%> we have <S%H8085>heard,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> have we <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3559>establish<s%> it <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
We have <S%H1819>thought<s%> of thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thy <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

According to thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> is thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H7099>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>
Let <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> let the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> be <S%H1523>glad,<s%> because <S%H4616>of<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
Walk <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and go round <S%H5362>about<s%> her: <S%H5608>tell<s%> the <S%H4026>towers<s%> thereof.

Mark ye <S%H7896>well<s%> <S%H3820><s%> her <S%H2430>bulwarks,<s%> <S%H6448>consider<s%> her <S%H759>palaces;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H5608>tell<s%> it to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H314>following.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> will be our <S%H5090>guide<s%> even <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H4191>death.<s%>
